column4: im attempting to install ubuntu on an averatec 3200 laptop, when i boot from the CD i get the normal prompt to install etc no problem, i select INSTALL UBUNTU and it loads but then just puts me in a bash prompt, no installation starts .... any ideas?
check your media with md5sum or the test on grub
i did that, i checked the integrity of the cd and it had no problems
ok well it may need a boot cheat noapic
so select noapic under the options ?
you edit the grub and add it then select b to boot it
how would i go about doing that ? could you point me to a forum post that explains that ?
helix ok well also there is cheat called acpi=force not sure if that will help...you do know how to edit the grub and boot with the modification ?
how would i go about doing that?
how do i edit grub ? ... what is grub? heh
helix it only uses the cheat once, it it works fine with cheat then you put it in the menu.lst after you make a backup.
how do i do that if there's no OS on the computer?
